heading: Hotfix 2 – August 11, 2023 – Patch 1.1.1
content: Hotfix 6 rolled out today addressing the low drop rates of Wrathful Hearts and Invokers. More hotfixes are coming in the next days to address other bugs and implement more improvements! It was mentioned that Patch 1.1.2 will be coming "very soon" on so stay tuned for more changes! Check out the If you haven't already, head on over to our and select the D4 role in #Roles to stay up to date with our content development. Written by:
